attributes.action: Make Illegal the hobbling/shackling of mares for breeding or to aid the breaking in of horses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When a mare is unwilling to be mounted by a stallion, fear for the stallion causes some stud farms to shackle or hobble the mares back legs so the stallion may mount without being kicked and wounded.

This is rape, if a mare is not willing to be mated by a stallion then it should be used in another sphere. 

To force a mare to take a stallion by restraining it in shackles that bite into the legs causing pain and distress is barbaric and should be made illegal.

These shackles are also sometimes used to aid with the breaking in of horses. 

It's disgusting and should be stopped.
